name: Space Parkour: Zero Gravity
description:
In Space Parkour you need to run and escape with 2 astronaut stickmen from an alien invasion through different battlefronts. You need brilliant command skills to encounters obstacles that would clearly be the end of your run. This is a deep space adventure way beyond the limits of the epic galactic war where running is the only option.
This massively addictive space puzzle and skill based game required excellent reflex skills and fast reactions. Explore all the 10 galaxies with star-gate teleports. Some stage portals will only open if you have the required stars. While you need to parkour in zero gravity space you also need to avoid aliens, ufo invaders and all obstacles.
Are you an experienced parkour runner, then test your reflex using the stickman pilot zero gravity abilities in this escape running game. Try to reach the remaining stars systems and outmaneuver the enemies with superior tactics in this unique parkour game.

Features:
- Over 10+ types of enemy
- Many hours of gameplay time
- 10 galaxy star system to explore
- More then 10 types of space traps and power ups (black holes, wormholes, space worm, asteroids, laser tanks, plasma beam traps, laser guns, spacemines etc...)

Space Parkour: Zero Gravity is an addictive space arcade game where you have to escape from enemy spaceships and aliens. You need fast reactions to avoid enemies, traps and reach the hyperspeed with portal gate to reach the safe planet.
